author: Leena Tailor
title: Lea Michele Kicks Off 2017 by Posing Completely Nude in Sexy NSFW Pic!
text: Lea Michele Kicks Off 2017 by Posing Completely Nude in Sexy NSFW Pic! by Leena Tailor 2:10 PM PST, January 03, 2017 Playing Lea Michele Kicks Off 2017 by Posing Completely Nude in Sexy NSFW Pic! Lea Michele has kicked off 2017 by stripping down for a sexy, celebratory nude pic! The Scream Queens star marked the new year by posing on a white wall against a picturesque background, wearing absolutely nothing . “Loving you so far 2017,” the 30-year-old actress captioned the pic, which had a fern graphic covering her private parts. A photo posted by Lea Michele (@leamichele) on Jan 1, 2017 at 5:49pm PST Michele also posted a recap video of 2016, featuring snaps of her poolside, hitting red carpets, working out and making media appearance throughout the year. “2016 was a great year full of many new adventures!” she wrote. “Can't wait to share all that's to come in 2017! Wishing all of you a happy and healthy New Year!” A video posted by Lea Michele (@leamichele) on Dec 31, 2016 at 3:44pm PST In another post, the actress shared a clip of her rendition of Britney Spears’ “Baby One More Time” from an old episode of Glee. “Stepping into 2017 like…” she captioned the video. A video posted by Lea Michele (@leamichele) on Dec 30, 2016 at 9:37pm PST Michele recently opened up about why’s she so comfortable being naked . See her talk about baring her birthday suit in the video below. RELATED SLIDESHOW
